svcproc.title: Camshaft Bushings
svcproc.para: Inspect the four camshaft bushings for wear and proper running clearance as follows:

step1.para: Using a Telescoping Gauge, measure camshaft bushing inside diameter with bushings installed in crankcase. See Special Service Tools.

figure.caption: Measuring the camshaft bushing inner diameter

step1.para: Measure telescoping gauge with a 2-3 inch micrometer and record measurement.
To determine running clearance for each bushing / journal, subtract previous camshaft journal diameter reading from camshaft bushing inside diameter reading. See Specifications.
If maximum allowable running clearance is exceeded, replace camshaft bushings. See camshaft bushing removal and installation procedures within this section. Also, see Specifications.
Inspect each bushing bore in crankcase for burrs or debris that could potentially damage new bushings.
Remove burrs and clean bores thoroughly before installing new camshaft bushings.
